title._content: Fort Street schoolboys being shown rabbit fur felt hat-making, 1927 / Sam Hood

tag.raw: State Library of New South Wales
tag.author: 29454428@N08

description._content: Format: photograph Notes: Fort Street schoolboys being shown rabbit fur felt hat-making by Akubra at the Australian Manufacturers' Exhibition, which promoted Australian-made products. Part of the "Buy Australian Made" campaign. Find more detailed information about this photograph: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=10334 Search for more great images in the State Library's collections: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/search/SimpleSearch.aspx From the collection of the State Library of New South Wales www.sl.nsw.gov.au
